page.title: 05CLUBS-ELLOUGHTON AREA
page.content: Organised clubs for young people in the area include : Boys' Brigade, Girls' Brigade, Brownies, Cubs, Girl Guides, Scouts, Venture Scouts, Rangers, Junior Christian Endeavour Society, various Youth Clubs, nursery schools and play groups. Other groups in the area catering for different age groups include :Men's and women's sections of British Legion, Petuaria Players Dramatic Society, Senior Citizens Association, Village Friendship Service, Women's Institutes, Women's Voluntary Service, Men's Society, Mother's Union, Mother and Young Child Group, Ladies' Fellowship, Wives and Mothers Group, Women's Fellowship, Women's Own, Bell ringing, Preservation Society, Memorial Club and Georgian Society.
